articles.description: Three high-profile Hong Kong democracy activists were jailed Wednesday, others have already fled the city, while still more face prosecution. Their cases involve a host of charges, both serious and petty.

articles.author: By Ben Westcott and Adam Renton, CNN
articles.title: The latest on the coronavirus pandemic and vaccines
articles.description: The coronavirus pandemic has brought countries to a standstill. In many places, as countries reopen, Covid-19 cases are on the rise. Follow here for the latest.
articles.content:
The UK became the first Western country to authorize a Covid-19 vaccine on Wednesday, marking a pivotal moment in the global fight against coronavirus.

articles.title: Watch nurse's desperate plea after household falls ill with coronavirus
articles.description: CNN's Don Lemon talks with nurse Sofia Burke, whose entire household has been stricken with coronavirus.

articles.author: Jake Kwon, Paula Hancocks and Yoonjung Seo, CNN
articles.title: Half a million South Korean students sit a college entrance exam despite rising Covid cases
articles.description: Half a million students will sit South Korea's notoriously difficult National College Entrance Exam on Thursday, a marathon, nine-hour test day that is the country's answer to the SATs and can determine a teenager's future.

articles.author: Lauren del Valle and Peter Nickeas, CNN
articles.title: Massachusetts lawmakers pass policing reform bill
articles.description: Massachusetts state legislators passed a sweeping police reform bill Tuesday that amends use of force and training policies and tailors law enforcement legal protections.

articles.author: Jamiel Lynch and Leah Asmelash, CNN
articles.title: Lon Adams, who developed the recipe for Slim Jim jerky, dies of Covid-19
articles.description: Lon Adams, known for developing the recipe for Slim Jim jerky, has died from Covid-19 complications on Saturday, his funeral home confirmed. He was 95.

articles.author: Amir Vera and Andy Rose, CNN
articles.title: Six people are missing after landslides in Alaska
articles.description: Heavy rains and flooding washed out a hillside Wednesday in the small community of Haines, Alaska, causing mudslides and making dozens of homes uninhabitable.

articles.author: Analysis by Zachary B. Wolf, CNN
articles.title: How YOLO will Trump go?
articles.description: There are not Republicans and Democrats this month. There are people who buy President Donald Trump's conspiracy theories and those who don't. Those who don't have less and less patience for their former allies.

articles.title: CNN 10 - December 3, 2020
articles.description: December 3, 2020

articles.title: Cuomo rips complicit republicans empowering Trump's lies
articles.description: CNN's Chris Cuomo slams Republicans who continue to empower President Donald Trump and his continued misleading claims about the election.

articles.title: 'Lock him up!': Trump ally attacks Georgia's Republican governor
articles.description: President Trump and his allies are repeatedly attacking Republican state officials, including Georgia Gov. Brian Kemp, for not overturning the outcome of the election in his favor. CNN's Erin Burnett says the attacks are "doing great harm."
